name: Game Jam Time
description:
Time is running out. How will our protagonists adventure through this story as they discover the surprises along the way? In the short time span they have left!

This is a short game that you can finish within 20 minutes. It is created for a game jam called the "Build Your Own Game Jam."

Recommended Minimum System:

  • Operating System (OS): 32-bit, Microsoft® Windows® XP
  • Processor: 800MHz Intel® Pentium® III
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM (XP), 1 GB (Vista/7/8.1/10)
  • Screen Resolution: 800x600
  • Storage: 90 MB available space

We developed this game using an engine called RPG Maker VX Ace, along with additional free scripts downloaded from Yanfly's site and Moghunter's site.
